title: LF a duo partner or just some people to play with
body:
Hey guys! Looking for anyone to play with mostly norms since I can't play ranked yet. I just wanna play with someone else since all the people I can play with are either actually new to the game or some Korean guy that doesn't know English.
So yea :D add me on my IGN "Talón" I just wanna level up my acc and play with someone thnx!

replies.body: Hey I'd be interested in duoing, I'm p2 and play jg and adc mostly but can play all roles well except top
